title: What are the advantages and disadvantages of taking the SAT in May? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are no advantages or disadvantages relative to a “curve.” I want to head this off from the outset. Please review this article for a further discussion: The Easiest Test Date for the SAT and ACT - Powerful Prep The only real consideration you have is this: when do you feel most prepared to take the SAT? Many people do not feel that May is an optimal time because they often have AP exams and finals to focus on. If that is your situation, then I recommend taking it during the summer or the early fall. If, however, you do feel most prepared for the May test—maybe you just finished a prep course or maybe your practice score is above your target score— then May would be a good test date for you. For a more specific discussion of how to create a timeline of testing, please review this article https://www.powerfulprep.com/when-to-take-the-sat/
